column5: Hey Guys,  Was in fishing the Grand River this morning from 8 am to about 12 pm, and from the moment we set our lines to the last double header the cats were co-operating. I don't do a lot of catfishing so I don't know if this is a normal day for cats but for me it seemed like a really great day on the water. My grandpa and I caught 12 Catfish in the span of 4 hours and had 2 double headers. I would say all of the cats were over the 10 lb mark and some might have been pushing the 20 mark. Best catfishing day on the water I ever had and will definately be heading back again! Just need a couple days for my arms to recover!  Here are some of the Cats
Thanks for the great report and pics, cats can always give up that great fight and noone can argue  with that
Looks like a Puuurrrrrr - fect day!  Way to go!  Don
wow , i guess a bit of recovery is a good idea lookin' at those tanks.  a great day on the grand with your grand dad for sure .  nice pics of some beauty cats .
Great report and pics Minnow  Beauty cats for sure    Congratulations to you and your Grandpa and thanks for sharing Leechman
We were there today, and didn't even come close to the numbers you guys got.  Good work.
we were on shore there only two guys really catching fish , fang got one andf the guy beside him got a bunch sunburned face , now lots of aleo vera
The wind was unrelenting.  Shore fishing would've been much more comfortable.
I wass out there today.... and I hate you... LOL... all I caught was a tan.. the wind was not so much fun today!  G
a "tan" more like a burn lol after like 5min my face went red  nice fish by the way i was out in my kayak getting weird looks got hits but nothing
Kyle.... note the new sig  LOL!
For those that dont know.... our friend Kyle was introduced to a couple of the "funner" OFC'rs today LOL.... poor kid will never be the same I am afraid!..  LOL nice to meet you Kyle.  G.
Nice meeting you Gerritt and did MIike land anything by the way?

was out there today , met nancur  cool guy and another gentleman ( not on this site) but he offered me some bait to fish with ..gulp was useless and yamamoto worms can float back to Japan hehe but seriously Im going to bring lots of cut~bait with me...the guy caught a 10 pounder and 11 pounder within half an hour with dead stinking minnows! I had to go early but it was exciting to seee the size of the cats! as per pics above^^ P/s it's a beauty spot by fishmaster property! Thanks again!
congrats on thegood day fishin,,,good memories made with gramps for sure!! Finally got the boat all polished and ready for the water so i'll be heading out there this week sometime!!
I was looking to take my fiance down there maybe Monday.  Do you need to anchor?  or is drifting ok?
anchor down is the best way
